document_api_meta.title: Create Packages
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to ship orders (purchase labels). This API is region specific to the US. The shipping fee and delivery time is an estimate only and is based on the package dimensions and weight you provided. Based on the package attributes, options listed below may differ from your shipping subscriptions.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: order_line_item_ids
request_body_param.desc: List of order line item IDs.

request_body_param.name: ^length
request_body_param.desc:
Package length.

The length, width, and height must be passed together.

request_body_param.name: ^width
request_body_param.desc:
Package width.

The length, width, and height must be passed together.

request_body_param.name: ^height
request_body_param.desc:
Package height.

The length, width, and height must be passed together.

request_body_param.name: ^unit
request_body_param.desc:
The unit of measurement for the package dimensions.

Available values:
- `CM`
- `INCH`

request_body_param.name: shipping_service_id
request_body_param.desc:
Specify the shipping service used. 
If not specified, use the default service obtained from [Get Eligible Shipping Service](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650aa6b2bace3e02b75dda4e).

request_body_param.name: ^value
request_body_param.desc: The numerical value of the package weight.

request_body_param.name: ^unit
request_body_param.desc:
The unit of measurement for the package weight.

Available values:
- `GRAM`
- `POUND`

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^order_line_item_ids
response_param.desc: List of order line item IDs.

response_param.name: ^^unit
response_param.desc:
The unit of measurement for the package dimensions.

Available values:
- `CM`
- `INCH`

response_param.name: ^^earliest_delivery_days
response_param.desc: The minimum estimated duration required for package delivery.

response_param.name: ^^latest_delivery_days
response_param.desc: The maximum estimated duration required for package delivery.

response_param.name: ^^value
response_param.desc: The numerical value of the package weight.

response_param.name: ^^unit
response_param.desc:
The unit of measurement for the package weight.

Available values:
- `GRAM`
- `POUND`

response_param.name: ^create_time
response_param.desc:
The time when the product was created.
Unix timestamp.

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
invalid param.
System timeout. If this error persists, please contact the platform for assistance.
Shipping service operation conflict error, please double check the shipping service ID.
No available shipping services for this request. Please modify the package weight or check the recipient address. If the error persists, please contact the platform for assistance.
illegal address
product oversize
This tracking number cannot be matched to any carrier, please check the tracking number and upload again.
invalid param
Invalid parameters. Please ensure you are passing the correct request parameter(s).
System process error, please try again later.
create label shipping service not found
Your country does not support the use of this feature.
Seller cannot operate orders which are fulfilled by platform
seller already print shipping label
This interface cannot be used in this region.
fulfill_unit action not allowed
These orders are already shipped.
Package item has after-sale request, please process the after-sale request first.
not match trade rule
These orders are already shipped.
order does not belong to fulfill unit
order already combined
split order not allowed

There are no available shipping services for this request. Please modify the package weight, or double check the recipient address. If after multiple retries you continue to experience this error, please contact the platform for assistance.
Order has combine, not allow split order
There are multiple packages that can be shipped, please specify the order line that needs to be shipped.
A shipping label has already been purchased.
Cannot purchase shipping label, please try again later.
System process error, please try again later.
Processing create_label_status not allow to operate this action
Shipping label purchase successful. This operation is not allowed in the current order status.
fulfill unit status not allow to update pkg attr

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func fulfillment202309CreatePackagesPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.FulfillmentV202309API.Fulfillment202309PackagesPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBody := fulfillment_v202309.NewFulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBody()
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBody.SetOrderId("2882335594258860015")
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyOrderLineItemIdsList := []string{"32132124331234"}
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBody.SetOrderLineItemIds(fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyOrderLineItemIdsList)
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyDimension := fulfillment_v202309.NewFulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyDimension()
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyDimension.SetLength("1.2")
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyDimension.SetWidth("0.2")
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyDimension.SetHeight("0.03")
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyDimension.SetUnit("CM")
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBody.SetDimension(*fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyDimension)
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBody.SetShippingServiceId("288233559123860015")
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyWeight := fulfillment_v202309.NewFulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyWeight()
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyWeight.SetValue("1.2")
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyWeight.SetUnit("GRAM")
    fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBody.SetWeight(*fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBodyWeight)
    request = request.Fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBody(*fulfillment202309CreatePackagesRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to fulfil and manage orders on seller's behalf, and provide real-time updates on the status of seller's orders.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to fulfil and manage orders on your behalf, and provide real-time updates on the status of your orders.
